description: Input on a queue with optional selector, regular or wiretap consumer.

properties.name: queuename
properties.label: Queue Name
properties.description: Provide the name of the queue to connect this input to.

properties.name: wiretap
properties.label: As Wiretap
properties.description: A wiretap gets copies of messages from the queue but leaves the original message untouched. Otherwise it is a regular consumer on that queue.

properties.name: selector
properties.label: Selector
properties.description: Provide an optional JMS message selector (SQL where condition, reference the properties in the message).
